ProjectTitle: Kant’s Cosmological Critique: Rational Cosmology and the Development of the Critical Philosophy
InitialFeedbackHistory:
23/06/2022

4. Metadata and documentation: Have you considered using tools that can help with data management? If you haven’t tried out a reference manager like Zotero (www.zotero.org) yet, we heartily recommend those. They're easy to use, have a lot of handy document organization features, and can save you time when you start writing to publish. If you work with images, Tropy (https://tropy.org) may be useful, Tropy is free and specifically designed to organize and annotate archival images. For qualitative data analysis of primarily textual information (text mining) NVivo may be handy, for more information: https://admin.kuleuven.be/icts/english/research/software/Nvivo/nvivo. 
6, 7. Sharing: Please note that Lirias is not suitable for data sharing, instead you can use KU Leuven RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr)
If you like to learn more about tools and data sharing you can always request a meeting via rdm@kuleuven.be
label: good with suggestions
